action.description: The action tied to the message. Possible values are limited to those specified below.

created.description: The UNIX timestamp of the date the message was created.

publication_date.description: The UNIX timestamp of the date the message was published.

revision_timestamp.description: The UNIX timestamp of the date the message was changed.

nid.description: The Drupal id of the document. Used by News and Content APIs to construct their internal ids for this resource.

layout.description: The presentation layout that will be used for this App Block. Possible values are limited to those specified below.

label.description: **Plain Text.** Optional short label that appears with the main text.

title.description: **Plain Text.** The title/headline of the App Block.

content.description: **Rich Text.** Displayed on the welcome screen as the main text. This is field that can contain limited markup, but no widgets or embedded items.

images.description: Array of one or more ordered set of images. No instance overrides allowed on image properties.

url.description: A valid url to the linked resource.

type.description: The type of resource being linked to. This field is required when `link` is not null. Possible values are limited to those specified below.

link.description: A linked resource. If not null, `url` and `type` are required.

hidden.description: Publication state on whether its hidden or not.

entry.description: The core body of the message.

type.description: The content type of the message.
